field.name: summary
field.value: Nested build failed, stop at Castle.ActiveRecord.build

field.name: description
field.value:

Total time: 2.2 seconds. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ But if I built Castle.ActiveRecord from Visual Studio 2005 it built without any problem, so I assume it is a Nant script bug.
